welcome.title: about
welcome.desc: Welcome to my website, I'm ngn
welcome.whoami: I'm a security, privacy and freedom advocate high-schooler from Turkey
welcome.interest: I'm interested in system security and software development
welcome.support: I love and support Free/Libre and Open Source Software (FLOSS)

work.title: work
work.desc: I don't currently have a job, so I spend most of my time...

links.title: contact
links.desc: Here are some useful links if you want to get in contact with me
links.prefer: I highly prefer email, you can send encrypted emails using my PGP key

services.title: services
services.desc: A part from working on stupid shit, I host free (as in freedom and price) services available for all
services.speed: All of these services are available over an 1 Gbit interface
services.security: All use SSL encrypted connection and they respect your privacy and freedom
services.privacy: Accessible from clearnet, TOR and I2P, no region or network blocks
services.bullshit: No CDNs, no cloudflare, no CAPTCHA, no analytics, no bullshit

projects.title: projects
projects.desc: I mostly work on free software projects, here are some of projects that you might find interesting

donate.title: donate!
donate.info: I spend a lot of time and money on different projects and maintaining different services.
donate.price: I mostly pay for hosting and electricity. Which when added up costs around 550â‚º per month (~$15 at the time of writing).
donate.details: So even a small donation would be useful. And it would help me keep everything up and running.
donate.thanks: Also huge thanks to all of you who have donated so far!
